name: Cheesy Broccoli Gnocchi 🥗
description: This recipe combines soft and pillowy gnocchi with the delicious flavor of broccoli and the richness of cheese for a comforting and hearty meal. With just a few simple ingredients, this dish comes together quickly and easily, making it perfect for a weeknight dinner.
instructions: Bring some water to the boil in a saucepan and boil the runner beans and broccoli for 2-3 minutes.
Take them out of the water and set aside.
In the same boiling water, cook the gnocchi for 2 minutes (or, until it floats to the top of the water). Drain.
In the same saucepan, mix together the drained gnocchi, runner beans, broccoli, mozzarella, parmesan, cream, and pepper.
Pour into an ovenproof dish and bake for 5 minutes at 180°C (350°F), until the cheese bubbles.
